content: *francesca shawl is made in a brioche stitch it s an easy but elegant project for long autumn evenings * **suggested yarn** filcolana anina + tilia pascuali saffira + mohair bliss lamana milano + premia knitting for olive merino + soft silk mohair **yarn held double ** you will need 900-1000m of yarn **needles** 4 5mm us 7 / 80 cm 32-40 circular needles photos were taken by my testers @woolofthings @dreamingyarn @na sztukistudio
